channel.title: Olearia Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 1.1
item.description:
New in 1.1

  • Added self Updating via the Sparkle Framework.
  • Added Norwegian Localization.
  • Fixed an issue where the preference window toolbar icons did not appear in languages other than english.
    •        

New in 1.0

  • Completely updated the entire core to accept plugins.
  • Updated support for 2.02, 2002, 2005 formats for Text Only, Partial Audio and Full Text Full Audio.
  • Added support for Bookshare Text Only books.
  • Fixed lots of major and minor issues throughout.
